product_name: Portland-Limestone with Silica Fume Blended Cement
product_description.usage: Portland-silica fume blended cement is used in a wide variety of concrete construction, including structural, commercial, and architectural applications. It is suitable for High Performance Concrete (HPC) applications.
product_description.packaging: Regionally available and can be supplied in bulk quantities.
product_description.composition_and_materials: Calcium silicate based clinker, gypsum, and silica fume ground to a fine powder.
blended_cement_types: ASTM C595 Type IP portland-pozzolan cement with silica fume
ASTM C595 Type IT ternary blended cement with silica fume
product_description.benefits: Well suited for high performance concrete applications with enhanced strengths or durability properties.
product_description.limitations: Good concreting practices are required. Variables affecting performance are beyond the control of the cement manufacturer.

applicable_standards: ASTM C595 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cements
AASHTO M 240 Standard Specification for Blended Hydraulic Cements
CSA A3000 Cementitious Materials Compendium A362 Blended Hydraulic Cement
lca_information.physical_chemical_properties: Manufactured to conform to all applicable requirements for the designated type of ASTM C595, AASHTO M 240 and CSA A3000.

transport_and_installation.requirements: Consult specific project requirements or applicable specifications and guides.
transport_and_installation.preparatory_work: Deliver products in original, unopened containers. Store materials protected from harmful environmental conditions.
transport_and_installation.methods: Proper proportioning, batching, mixing, placing, consolidating, finishing, and curing are critical. Water-cement ratio is especially critical.

additional_info.safety_precautions: Refer to the applicable Safety Data Sheet (SDS). Avoid direct contact with skin. Use proper PPE.
additional_info.availability_and_cost: Regionally available. Contact the nearest Holcim (US) Inc. sales office for pricing.
additional_info.warranty: Material Certification Reports available upon request. No guarantee on finish work.
additional_info.technical_services: Available by contacting the nearest Holcim (US) Inc. sales office.
additional_info.filing_systems: Additional product information is available from the manufacturer.
